FuncDef: The display any-flow flow-cache command displays flow table statistics. The display any-flow flow-cache command displays flow table statistics. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
CLIs: display any-flow flow-cache { ipv4 | ipv6 } slot <slot-id>

display any-flow flow-cache sip <ipv4-sip-address> dip <ipv4-dip-address> [ srcport <srcport-number> | dstport <dstport-number> | protocol <protocol-number> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> | vlan <vlan-id> | vni <vni-id> | rocev2 [ dest-qp <dest-qp-value> ] ] slot <slot-id>

display any-flow flow-cache ipv6 sip <ipv6-sip-address> ipv6dip <ipv6-dip-address> [ srcport <srcport-number> | dstport <dstport-number> | protocol <protocol-number> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> | vlan <vlan-id> | vni <vni-id> | rocev2 [ dest-qp <dest-qp-value> ] ] slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a board.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies a source IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the source IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-bit hexadecimal string in format X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies a destination IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Sets a destination IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-bit hexadecimal string in format X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies a source port number.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 65535.

Specifies a destination port number.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 65535.

Specifies the protocol type.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Displays information about a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. _public_ cannot be used as the VPN instance name. If the string is enclosed in double quotation marks ("), spaces are allowed in the string.
Description:
_public_ indicates a public VPN instance.

Specifies the VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Specifies an VNI.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 16777215.

Specifies the value of RoCEv2 queue pair.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 16777215.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display any-flow flow-cache ipv6 sip 2001:db8:1::1 ipv6 dip 2001:db8:2::1 vpn-instance vpn1 slot 1
<HUAWEI> display any-flow flow-cache sip 192.168.1.2 dip 10.1.1.1 vpn-instance vpn1 slot 1
